A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I wish I could give it negative stars. This wasn't just bad as a Star Wars Movie\, this was an awful movie. I only made it to the end because my theatre served Whiskey. The plot is awful\, it doesn't make sense\, and they assassinate the most beloved character of the franchise. I could go on for hours but most of it has already been posted. Most likely\,I won't see another Star Wars movie in the theatre. I don't like where it's going.
